data.title: Cult Recovery Books
data.meta_description: Discover Angela Clark, an inspiring life coach and recording artist based in Caldwell, ID, dedicated to empowering women and men to find their voice and achieve more in life. Explore personal coaching services, groundbreaking books like 'Awakening from Unconscious Resentment,' and soulful music to transform your life. Join Angela's mission to empower lives through coaching, music, and inspirational stories. Schedule a session today to start your journey towards fulfillment and happiness.
